author: Willy
content: Wow, those ships were huge! The barge that was anchored above seems miniscule to the wreck below.

author: mike lee
content: There is a wonderful book by Michael Palin about the history of the Erebus and Terror expeditions to the Antarctic and then to the N.W. Passage. Very well worth a read. It’s a really fascinating story. Here are the names and histories of the very people who wore those epaulettes and ate off those plates.
